JobFullDesc:
You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back.
At American Express, we know that with the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways. Whether we’re supporting our customers’ financial confidence to move ahead, taking commerce to new heights, or encouraging people to explore the world, our colleagues are constantly redefining what’s possible — and we’re proud to back each other every step of the way. When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day.

Functional Description:
• Lead, coach and develop CCPs.
• Develop and maintain strong relationships with business partners across the Network.
• Ensure appropriate operational controls are in place and maintained on an ongoing basis.
• Ensure that daily volumes are worked in a timely manner, in full compliance with management and financial policies,
• Identify negative trends in operational indicators and implement effective corrective measures with a sense of urgency.
• Effectively manage operational issues, concerns, negotiations, performance results and relationships.
• Achieve high levels of Colleague engagement and motivation.
• Maximize and encourage “Colleague Engagement” through effective & timely communication while utilizing various leadership development programs to develop talent.
• Understand Digital Capabilities and the application. 
• Interact with multiple stakeholders to accelerate Digital advancement.
• Effective in operating autonomously and making complex decisions in situations of ambiguity and time pressure
• Strong internal and external customer focus: Exhibits effective judgment of customer and business needs to deliver profitable growth and drive transformational change
Qualifications:

•Graduate
Strong Interpersonal skills and ability to work well in a matrixed team,
•             Excellent written and verbal communication/presentation skills and experience,
•             Excellent people management skills,
•             Excellent analytical and problem solving skills,
•             Solid PC Skills, specifically in MS office
•             Self-starter with attention to detail and able to work with minimum supervision and lead by example,
•             Knowledge of local market collections processes,
•             Ability to drive change with a focus on execution,
Critical Challenges
•             Managing multiple job tasks and projects while ensuring flawless execution and attention to detail,
•             To be able to deliver and drive consistency of performance and results,
•             Ensure that the Amex Brand is protected. 
The American Express competencies associated with this role are:
•             Develops Winning Strategies
•             Drives Innovation and Change
•             Drives Results
•             Builds and Leverages Relationships
•             Communicates Effectively
•             Demonstrates Personal Excellence
American Express is an equal opportunity employer and makes employment decisions without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, age, or any other status protected by law

Offer of employment with American Express is conditioned upon the successful completion of a background verification check, subject to applicable laws and regulations
